com.samskivert.swing
Class TGraphics2D

java.lang.Object
  java.awt.Graphics
      java.awt.Graphics2D
          com.samskivert.swing.TGraphics2D

public class TGraphics2D
extends Graphics2D

A Graphics2D that pipes all processing to two subgraphics.

Constructor Summary

          Construct a TGraphics2D.

Constructor Detail

TGraphics2D

public TGraphics2D(Graphics2D primary,
                   Graphics2D copy)
Construct a TGraphics2D.

Parameters:
primary - the primary underlying graphics. Get methods will result in calls only to the primary Graphics2D.
copy - the underlying graphics of lesser importance.
Method Detail

getPrimary

public Graphics2D getPrimary()
Get the primary Graphics2D underneath us, for bypass purposes.
